titles.title: Provide for the consideration of H.R. 325.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Bonior. Petition No: 106-6.

bill.summary: 9/23/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 325 (Federal minimum wage increase).Prohibits the Clerk of the House of Representatives from preparing the engrossment of H.R. 325 until the 30th calendar day following its passage. Provides that if, before such day, the House has passed a bill introduced by Representative Charles B. Rangel and Representative John S. Tanner relating to tax relief for small businesses, then the Clerk shall immediately prepare the engrossment.Directs the Clerk upon the passage of such bill within the described period, in the engrossment of H.R. 325, to: (1) add the text of the bill at the end of H.R. 325; and (2) make appropriate conforming changes.
